CREATE_TABLE_ABSENCE: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS ABSENCE (ID INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, HOUR INTEGER, DAY INTEGER, MONTH INTEGER, YEAR INTEGER, ASSIGNMENTID INTEGER, STUDENTID INTEGER);
CREATE_TABLE_ASSIGNMENT: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS ASSIGNMENT (ID INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, LABEL TEXT, LABELEN TEXT);
CREATE_TABLE_CLASSROOM: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS CLASSROOM (ID INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, LABEL TEXT, LABELEN TEXT);
CREATE_TABLE_REASON: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS REASON (ID INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, LABEL TEXT, LABELEN TEXT);
CREATE_TABLE_STUDENT: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS STUDENT (ID INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, FIRSTNAME TEXT, LASTNAME TEXT);
CREATE_TABLE_STUDENTCLASSROOM: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS STUDENTCLASSROOM (STUDENTID INTEGER, CLASSROOMID INTEGER);
CREATE_TABLE_SUBJECT: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS SUBJECT (ID INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, LABEL TEXT, LABELEN TEXT);
CREATE_TABLE_TEACHER: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS TEACHER (ID INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, LABEL TEXT, LABELEN TEXT);
SELECT_TEACHERS: SELECT ID, LABEL, LABELEN FROM TEACHER;
INSERT_TEACHER: INSERT INTO TEACHER (ID, LABEL, LABELEN) VALUES (?, ?, ?);
